main event: A civilian observer reported a red and white blinking light in the sky over Orogrande, New Mexico.
interesting points: The light blinked intermittently, varying from very bright to very dark,The light moved vertically at a high rate of speed,Several aircraft were in the area, but this light did not match their conditions,The observation lasted for about 15 minutes,The observer was situated on US Highway 54, 18 to 28 miles north of Orogrande.
sighted object: one red and white blinking light
